TopicTitle: Computer Hangs When Installing Certain Mods

Articles.Content:
So it appears that my desktop computer (specs below) will completely freeze when I install certain mods. Primarily planet mods or visual enhancement mods. I am running version 1.3 KSP 64 bit version if that helps, I should also mention that I do not get a crash report. My specs are:

Windows 10

AMD RX 480

Intel Core i5 6402P @ 2.80GHz

8 GB RAM

1TB Toshiba Hard drive 

MSI Bazooka motherboard 

Any help would be greatly appreciated 

EDIT: I have fixed it

 

Edited June 15, 2017 by SAlNT
fixed issue
